## [`account 1 token`]
```js

```

```

curl -k "https://restaurant-api.wolt.com/v1/user/me" \
  -H "Host: restaurant-api.wolt.com" \
  -H "User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:137.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/137.0" \
  -H "Accept: application/json, text/plain, */*" \
  -H "Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5" \
  -H "Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br, zstd" \
  -H "Referer: https://wolt.com/" \
  -H "Platform: Web" \
  -H "App-Language: en" \
  -H "ClientVersionNumber: 1.14.89" \
  -H "Client-Version: 1.14.89" \
  -H "x-wolt-web-clientid: 234ca2ec-bbc2-4ef2-8e0b-174ff6a0d840" \
  -H "w-wolt-session-id: bdedde53-2292-4050-a7b1-528cd0b047b5" \
  -H "authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJFUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IjY3ZTc3ZmNiMDAwMDAwMDAwMDAwMDAwMCIsInR5cCI6IngudXNlcitqd3QifQ..wIqX9-f0c-L2H_W6slxFBixA--Lfm7JD78dv52aMwwY6bY8YP7cnsib-APoA3KgLXXhZWjFbYcfetkaYfN1ZYA" \
  -H "Origin: https://wolt.com" \
  -H "Connection: keep-alive" \
  -H "Cookie: intercom-device-id-qwum5ehb=1960de93-74d0-4643-94ee-96c1b8b6b346; cwc-consents={\"analytics\":true,\"functional\":true,\"interaction\":{\"bundle\":\"allow\"},\"marketing\":true,\"updatedAt\":{\"bundle\":\"2025-04-05T18:07:26.633Z\",\"analytics\":\"2025-04-05T18:07:26.000Z\",\"functional\":\"2025-04-05T18:07:26.000Z\",\"marketing\":\"2025-04-05T18:07:26.000Z\",\"required\":\"2025-04-05T18:28:07.000Z\"},\"userId\":\"67c9c8086093b14a8c9a1bf5\",\"versions\":{\"bundle\":[\"6f6e0a18-e3dd-43e8-9e57-7e09f6d90239\",\"4900fd93-1d29-4f54-b165-82d98b47c9ce\"],\"analytics\":[\"716f579d-563b-43c4-9544-b7744e910922\",\"866de2a7-f093-414c-bc8c-a744f9427c62\"],\"functional\":[\"1ce7c01e-9264-4f9b-9485-4503c936e590\",\"cdcacfa1-9cfe-4a31-970c-93ddf2c42d51\"],\"marketing\":[\"64deac7c-b440-4f76-a9b6-a8278e44592f\",\"25ca0646-ac9b-4604-890f-dc501532a7ce\"],\"required\":[\"581b8464-5d8a-4afa-b728-bb5c0df7f9c4\",\"52a32bca-31d8-4f34-b232-5fb3d9757d2c\"]}}; __woltUid=234ca2ec-bbc2-4ef2-8e0b-174ff6a0d840; intercom-session-qwum5ehb=ZnZiUEs4NWh2TjlySmFIS2syVGlsNTZKeTVpSmV5d2pKSTBVN2RGQkhYMlFSd3hnQzdETjlmZUMraVVtV3JkeGtXamlqV2dHRkhpMGxWL1dHWlhBSWJEbnNpckxWTElrd25Dek9JeFBIcDQ9LS1KNWQyWngzMUF2WnlkVUtXSEpPek5BPT0=--028aa11ac80e834b4d1ec863b68414f7ce0e2eb9; ravelinDeviceId=rjs-b39e64b1-ddff-49be-8c55-4970dcf828b2; ravelinSessionId=rjs-b39e64b1-ddff-49be-8c55-4970dcf828b2:16397e2d-c0c1-4637-9bf5-8fecd2c12ca0; __woltAnalyticsId=bdedde53-2292-4050-a7b1-528cd0b047b5" \
  -H "Sec-Fetch-Dest: empty" \
  -H "Sec-Fetch-Mode: cors" \
  -H "Sec-Fetch-Site: same-site" \
  -H "DNT: 1" \
  -H "Sec-GPC: 1"

  
# example cookie
```sh
cwc-consents={"analytics":true,"functional":true,"interaction":{"bundle":"allow"},"marketing":true,"updatedAt":{"bundle":"2025-04-03T08:49:40.906Z"},"versions":{"bundle":["6f6e0a18-e3dd-43e8-9e57-7e09f6d90239","4900fd93-1d29-4f54-b165-82d98b47c9ce"]}}; 
__woltUid=e0d68ede-99b5-439c-83b6-2d2c24017b4a;
ravelinDeviceId=rjs-eba31316-5fcc-48e8-b200-6536da7663c1; 
intercom-id-qwum5ehb=487c8099-fe40-4e7d-9b69-463397fc0687; 
intercom-session-qwum5ehb=; intercom-device-id-qwum5ehb=f97b05f4-07fb-4323-b1dc-557b13ccf175; 
__woltAnalyticsId=0ade9590-ce5a-48c3-87fd-57b46899d2df
```
## cookie values 
__woltUid=e0d68ede-99b5-439c-83b6-2d2c24017b4a; `Should be rotated on logout (but often isn't)`

Here's the complete `sectest.md` file with proper Markdown formatting that won't break when copied. Save this directly to a file:

```markdown
# Wolt Cookie Security Testing Methodology

## Cookie Analysis and Test Cases

### 1. `__woltUid` (User Identifier)
**Value**: `e0d68ede-99b5-439c-83b6-2d2c24017b4a`  
**Purpose**: Persistent user tracking across sessions  
**Security Tests**:
- [ ] **Rotation Test**: Verify cookie changes after logout
  ```bash
  # Get current cookie
  curl -I https://wolt.com | grep -i 'set-cookie.*__woltUid'
  
  # Test logout rotation
  curl -X POST https://wolt.com/logout -H "Cookie: __woltUid=OLD_VALUE" -v
  ```
- [ ] **UUID Validation**: Test invalid formats
  ```bash
  curl -H "Cookie: __woltUid=' OR 1=1--" https://wolt.com
  curl -H "Cookie: __woltUid=../" https://wolt.com
  ```
- [ ] **Cross-Session Persistence**: Check if cookie survives browser restart

### 2. `cwc-consents` (Consent Management)
**Value**:
```json
{
  "analytics":true,
  "functional":true,
  "interaction":{"bundle":"allow"},
  "marketing":true,
  "updatedAt":{"bundle":"2025-04-03T08:49:40.906Z"},
  "versions":{"bundle":["6f6e0a18-e3dd-43e8-9e57-7e09f6d90239"]}
}
```
**Security Tests**:
- [ ] **Consent Bypass**:
  ```bash
  curl -H 'Cookie: cwc-consents={"analytics":false}' https://wolt.com
  ```
- [ ] **Version Spoofing**:
  ```bash
  curl -H 'Cookie: cwc-consents={"versions":{"bundle":["INJECTION"]}}' https://wolt.com
  ```
- [ ] **Timestamp Attack**:
  ```bash
  curl -H 'Cookie: cwc-consents={"updatedAt":{"bundle":"2000-01-01T00:00:00Z"}}' https://wolt.com
  ```

### 3. `ravelinDeviceId` (Fraud Prevention)
**Value**: `rjs-eba31316-5fcc-48e8-b200-6536da7663c1`  
**Tests**:
- [ ] **Device Fingerprinting**:
  ```bash
  # Clear cookie and check new generation
  curl -H "Cookie: ravelinDeviceId=;" https://wolt.com -v
  ```
- [ ] **Format Validation**:
  ```bash
  curl -H "Cookie: ravelinDeviceId=XSS<script>alert(1)</script>" https://wolt.com
  ```

### 4. Intercom Cookies
**Values**:
- `intercom-id-qwum5ehb=487c8099-fe40-4e7d-9b69-463397fc0687`
- `intercom-device-id-qwum5ehb=f97b05f4-07fb-4323-b1dc-557b13ccf175`

**Tests**:
- [ ] **Session Integrity**:
  ```bash
  # Test empty session handling
  curl -H "Cookie: intercom-session-qwum5ehb=;" https://wolt.com
  ```

### 5. `__woltAnalyticsId` (Session Tracking)
**Value**: `0ade9590-ce5a-48c3-87fd-57b46899d2df`  
**Tests**:
- [ ] **Session Fixation**:
  ```bash
  # Set pre-defined session ID
  curl -H "Cookie: __woltAnalyticsId=FIXED_VALUE" https://wolt.com/login -d 'user=test&pass=test'
  ```

## Severity Classification
| Test Case | Risk Level | CVSS Score |
|-----------|------------|------------|
| Cookie Not Rotated | High | 7.4 |
| Consent Bypass | Medium | 5.3 |
| Session Fixation | Critical | 8.1 |

## Recommended Mitigations
1. Implement proper cookie rotation on logout
2. Add signature validation for consent cookies
3. Set `HttpOnly` and `Secure` flags where missing
```
